wikipedia_page.main: John Anthony Lowey (7 March 1958 – 5 August 2019) was an English footballer who played as a midfielder. Aside from three seasons in the North American Soccer League, one in the American Soccer League and one in Australia, Lowey spent the majority of his career in the Football League Second Division with Blackburn Rovers in England.

response: *5 August – John Lowey, 61, English footballer (Sheffield Wednesday, Blackburn Rovers, Chester City).
